ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
ygData.msgSnippet: Kevin, don t you mean obscenely better :)  Last night I was in a group at the Frenzied room.  Just as I pulled a BT the tank in the group went LD.  So I told
ygData.messageBody:
Kevin, don't you mean obscenely better :) Last night I was in a group at
the Frenzied room. Just as I pulled a BT the tank in the group went LD. So
I told the cleric to root the thing as I chanted it to death. The silly
wizard had to start nuking though.

John, I wonder if 2 bards would be able to solo Frenzied room using the full
instrument combo you outlined yesterday?

-------------------------------------------------
Ro-kenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 8:12 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
>
>
> Yep, they work *much* better with an instrument now.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "CMai" <cmai@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 11:07 AM
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
>
>
> > so are you saying that the chant series are fix now even
> with instrument?
> > Because it used to be that it does not matter if you use an
> instrument or
> > not.
> >
> > Thank you,
> > Syren Wynd - The Bard of Bad Apple - The Rathe
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, April 06, 2000 4:59 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
> >
> >
> > Ok, I did a quickie chart to list all of our damage songs
> and fill in some
> > numbers:
> >
> > http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/Sylly/songdmg.asp
> >
> > (this chart presumes you are using an instrument)
> >
> > I would say that the best 3 song mix at level 50 is:
> SCC(48), TCF(38 or
> 46 -
> > either one if they do the same dmg & of course the one that
> is resisted
> > less) & DDD(18). Ugh swapping 3 different instruments.
> This would make
> me
> > choose the best songs for a 2 instrument swap that would
> have the best
> > chances of sticking.
> >
> > Also, looking at the chart, bards dont get the opportunity
> to weave 3
> > stacked songs until level 30 and then FCC(30) is likely
> resisted because
> of
> > the low difference in level between mob and song. So more
> like 32 or 33
> > before you get good results from weaving 3 stacked dmg songs.
> >
> > Sylly
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
